title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 471.7 - Motor vehicles transporting household goods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 471.7 - Motor vehicles transporting household goods

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 504, subd. 5
A motor vehicle is exempt if it is used exclusively in
the transportation of household goods, as defined by the Commissioner of

Transportation of the State of New York or the Interstate Commerce Commission, by a carrier under the authority of the Commissioner of Transportation of this

State or the Interstate Commerce Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
471.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
